frontmatter.title: Functors: Part 1
frontmatter.excerpt: It's only fitting that the inaugural post on functor.xyz covers the topics of functors! Anything else would be just criminal. That being said, this post will help readers demystify what a functor really is by learning about the functor laws. (spoiler: you've already been using them). To cap this off we will learn how to create our own home-made functor.
